The screen indicates that a search or query returned no matches.

prev_action_result:
By clicking on "Creations" in the previous screen, you attempted to navigate to the section where your saved creations in Google Photos are stored. However, the current screen shows a "No results" message, indicating that there are no creations currently available in that section. 

This means the action did not provide any progress towards the user request, as it did not show any saved creations. To move forward, you may need to verify if any creations were saved or try a different search or filter option to view them.
